description:
Part 2 of 4 from the January live show.
Poor Cherry Torn - with her arms bolted tight behind her back, and her legs bolted to the floor, she just has to take it as James Deen rams his cock down her throat over and over and over.
We see how many clothespins we can fit on her body, and then blindfold her, cane her, and throat fuck her so more.
title: Cherry Torn Throat Fucked, Blindfolded, Beaten, and Abused!
